name: Guess the Animal
description:
4 Ways to Play this Game...
Draw - Grab a whiteboard and get drawing, while everyone else guesss. Get it right, your up next.
Act - Get up and move around, act out the word, while everyone laughs at you and guesses. Get it right, next up on stage.
